title: Global Biodegradable Plastic Market to Reach $14.43 Billion by 2030, Driven by Rising Public Awareness of Plastic ... - Yahoo Finance
summary: The global biodegradable plastics market is projected to reach $14.43 billion by 2030, driven by growing concerns about plastic pollution and a shift towards sustainable alternatives. Key drivers include government regulations promoting eco-friendly solutions and increased consumer demand for sustainable products. Biodegradable plastics, particularly polylactic acid (PLA), are finding applications in packaging, agriculture, and consumer goods, offering a promising path towards a more sustainable future.

title: Global Precision Fermentation Market, 2023-2032: Dairy Alternatives Dominate Market, Whey and Casein Proteins to ... - GlobeNewswire
summary: The global precision fermentation market is expected to reach $73.76 billion by 2032, driven by increasing demand for sustainable and eco-friendly products, advancements in biotechnology, and growing investments in the field. The market is segmented by application (dairy alternatives, meat & seafood), ingredient (whey, casein protein), microbe (yeast, algae, fungi, bacteria), and region, with North America currently dominating the market.

title: $11.5 Bn Paper Straw Market - Global Forecast to 2028: High Cost of Paper Straws Poses Challenges to Market ... - GlobeNewswire
summary: The global paper straw market is projected to grow significantly due to rising consumer demand for sustainable alternatives to plastic straws, driven by environmental concerns and government regulations. The market is expected to reach USD 11.5 billion by 2028, with flexible paper straws leading the market due to their versatility and durability. Non-printed paper straws, which are made using sustainable and food-grade paper, are projected to be the fastest-growing segment.
